title: Video: Twin Oaks – Eighteen Minutes
content:
This luscious track from LA trio Twin Oaks has a glittering Daughter meets Cocteau Twins vibe to it – a slow burning yet utterly immersive number, the accompanying video is simple yet unquestionably fitting.

Building to a epic heart-wrenching finale, with singer Lauren Brown near weeping ‘even if it kills me’ over and over to conclusion. Check out Eighteen Minutes below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
